product_description: The Bissell CleanView Swivel pet gives you the outstanding performance you’d expect from an expert floor care company at a great price. It has specialized pet tools and features, so you know it’s designed for homes with pets. The triple action brush roll lifts, loosens and removes embedded pet hair and its silk-like bristles work gently on hard floors to remove fine debris while also keeping it contained with scatter-free technology. Just as its name suggests, the Clean View swivel pet has swivel steering that gets around and under furniture and other obstacles in your home. Pair that with edge-to-edge cleaning capabilities and you can clean with confidence that you’re getting more with each pass – giving you a new outlook on convenient cleaning. Buying this product saves pets. Bissell proudly supports Bissell Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a Bissell product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.

short_description: POWERFUL ALL FLOOR SUCTION: The Eureka NEU10AE5 upright vacuum cleaner effortlessly extracts dirt and hair from hard floors and carpets ease. The 10.5” wide cleaning path of this household vacuum cleaner helps cleaning larger areas quickly and with ease.

LIGHTWEIGHT & EASY STORAGE: Weighing only 7.7 pounds, this small vacuum cleaner can be carried anywhere with ease, while its compact and featherweight design allows this bagless vacuum cleaner to be stored in any space in your home when not in use.

EASY MAINTENANCE & ENVIROMENTAL FRIENDLY: This vacuum cleaner pet hair contains washable filter which can be rinsed and left to dry for no maintenance costs. Use our vacuum upright to embrace eco-friendly cleaning without compromising on effectiveness.

ALL TOOLS ON BOARD: This vacuum cleaner for home pets includes a crevice tool and dusting brush which snaps on the vacuum and are within reach at any time during cleaning. Simplify your cleaning routine while maximizing convenience with our upright vacuum cleaner best rated.
product_description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier. This upright vacuum is the ultimate cleaning tool for any home! With its lightweight design and powerful suction, this vacuum can handle messes on hardwood floors, low-pile carpets, and car interiors. Its compact size allowing for easy storage makes it essential for apartment living. The wide nozzle, crevice tool and dusting brush makes it a breeze to clean hard-to-reach areas like ceilings, upholstery, windows, lampshades, and furniture. Portable attachments, large dust cup and washable filter mean less time emptying and more time cleaning. This efficient and cheap handheld vacuum is the perfect dust cleaner for any household! Don't let dust take over your space - upgrade to our Eureka Airspeed compact bagless upright vacuum and experience the ultimate cleaning experience today! If you have any questions, contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886. Warning: When using the vacuum cleaner, the floor brush may be clogged by hairs and dirt. We recommend cleaning the roller brush and the belt every 2 weeks. Long-term failure to clean may cause malfunction, or even risk of smoke and belt broken.
